name: Miracle Worker
description:
How do the Chief Engineers on star ships earn their reputations as miracle workers? Find out, as you play as CHIEF ENGINEER on a star ship, meeting the demands of a pushy captain. Can you keep the core alive as the engines are pushed to the brink? Let’s find out!

CONTROLS - GAME PAD Left Stick Move A Jump X Pickup / Throw

PC WASD Movement LMB Pickup / Throw SPACE Jump

Windows 64 Bit version only right now

Video walkthrough here! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NW-3XAlCbS8
